Text: Thanks from Ken Walther Cc not begin to express my heart filled THANKS for all of the time and effort that everyone put into this successful YK effort It was truly great to see everyone working together to ensure that ENRON continues in it winning way by being the best at what we do I was truly blessed with the group of individuals listed above and their staffs that put the heart and soul into this process We have an outstanding team of individuals who in my opinion will always go the extra mile for ENRON Again Thanks everyone you have a lot to be proud We successfully survived the YK event

Final Review of YK Weekend Cc to attend on December th in Ebc at PM the final meeting this year concerning the process and timeline for the Millennium Rollover Testing weekend At this meeting I will roll out the final set of instructions concerning backing up of files testing timelines for the weekend Global Database testing and the dates and times for the final review meetinga At this meeting we will also discuss any concerns you may have related to the testing process as well as any last minute information from Corporate I look forward to seeing you thereThanks and Have a great holiday
